feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Development
feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Enhancement in PM Maintenance Order for PR Requisition
entry.content:
My Requirement is to create a custom field in the iw31,32,33 screen to take Requirement Urgency and i added the field using exit IWO10018

Now the second part of the requirement is to save the value of that field in the pr that is created in the maintenance order in eban so it appears in this screen when the user view the pr in the mm screen 

so i tried badi MM_PUR_S4_PR_MODIFY_ITEM and it didn't have the field prio_urg in it in the changing params i also tried ME_PROCESS_REQ_CUST and for some reason it doesn't save the value i searched and it had something to do with this structure MEREQ_ITEM_S_CUST_ALLOWED and if the field isn't there then i can't change it but here is the code i used 

METHOD if_ex_me_process_req_cust~process_item.

  "Run only on first call
  IF im_count = 1." im_count <> 1.
    break solex_abap1.
  DATA(ls_item) = im_item->get_data( ).
  data(ls_itex) = im_item->get_datax( ).

  DATA prio_urg TYPE aufk-zprio_urg.
  IMPORT prio_urg = prio_urg FROM MEMORY ID 'PRIO_URG'.

  IF prio_urg IS NOT INITIAL.
    ls_item-prio_urg = prio_urg.
    ls_itex-prio_urg = 'X'.
    im_item->set_data( ls_item ).
    IM_ITEM->SET_DATAX( LS_ITEX ).
  ENDIF.
  ENDIF.

ENDMETHOD.

i also tried exit MEREQ001 and it didn't have the field in the change params i also had the idea to debug until i find the fm where the pr is created but i also thought to ask maybe someone has a better suggestion,

thanks in advance

entry.title: How to properly save/post in EWM table /SCWM/HUHDR given two custom fields
entry.content:
Hi, experts!

I have an EWM problem. Pretty new to this module, and like VIM it requires you to do a configuration before enabling development.
Anyway, my requirement asks me to do an append structure for two new fields (one Order Number (aufnr) and a BIN (/scwm/gmbin) in standard table /SCWM/HUHDR. I already did this via SE11 (it's an intrusive change, I know). And I get the data through implementation of badi interface /SCWM/IF_EX_DLV_GM_PROCESS. My only problem is I don't know the proper way to save/post this in the Handling Unit header table. There could be function modules or other helper classes available but I'm not aware yet.

I've been advised to use method Query of helper class /scwm/cl_dlv_management_prd to get HU data, but I need a way to save it in the table.

To replicate the steps, I just visit t-code /SCWM/MON, input the provided inbound delivery number in the Inbound Delivery node, selected the document and its line item, and then press Goods Receipt button, then the BAdI will be triggered. Then upon save, the GR column will have the value "Completed" from "Not Started".



My main question is: what's the best practice on saving data to custom fields in ewm tables (specifically HU Header)? Do we have function modules or classes available to do this? I appreciate the responses, thanks!

entry.title: Different Characteristic value in 'MSC3N' & 'AUSP' table
entry.content:
Hello all,

Kindly provide solution to my problem below;

For an FS, i am getting different characteristic value from 'MSC3N' & 'AUSP' table i.e. i have a characteristic 'Z_WIDTH' and from 'MSC3N' i am getting the value 1130 and from table 'AUSP' its '1.1300000000000000E+03'. From which table i could get the value '1130' to complete my FS.

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Reset development object to SAP standard
entry.content:
Hi,

unfortunately we have several modifications in SAP development object using the SAP modification assistant.

We want to remove some of these modifications to switch back to the SAP default implementation.

The only way (that I know) to do this is by using transaction SPAU and reset the object to SAP.
In this case not only the code will reset to SAP implementation, the field "last changed by user" will be set to SAP aswell.
According to my experience so far, especially this field "last changed by user" of an object is the reason, if an object will be shown up during SPAU or not.

Is there any other way to reset a modified development object to SAP default?

If I simply remove the modifications, this only affects the code but not the field "last changed by user".

BR

entry.title: qRFC container - data change
entry.content:
Hello,

is there any chance anybody knows how to change the data in qRFC container? I know this is not what SAP advices but we do not have any other way to solve the issue with inconsistency data between EWM and ERP.

Particulry, I have few inbound  queues for outbound deliveries which are stuck in the entrance to SAP ERP because the dates specified there, are in closed period. So, I am trying to understand where and how I can change the date in the delivery in BAPI_OUTB_DELIVERY_CONFIRM_DEC since it does not contain any regular tables.

entry.title: custom page format created in SPAD tcode. but its not coming in SFP
entry.content:
Hi Friends,

In SFP, the paper type is set to Custom, but the output alignment is not correct in the spool. In the spool preview, the barcode always appears shifted to the right. The label contains only a barcode, with no other data. Additionally, the alignment differs when printing on the label printer.

To address this, I created a custom page format ZHULBL in SPAD; however, this page format is not available for selection in SFP.

 

Thanks with regards,

Vallamuthu M

entry.title: Frontend Error: Value '00000000' violates facet information 'nullable=false'
entry.content:
Type Frontend Error
Short Text Value '00000000' violates facet information 'nullable=false

We have an unmanaged entity in RAP where one key field is of type date which even if date is populated, we face the below error.
Value '00000000' violates facet information 'nullable=false'.

Request @SAP to solve this bug, since similar issue was reported by user 4 years ago still no solution was suggested

Similar question asked in 2022 still no answer

ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model  ABAP Development ABAP Development SAP Quality Issue Management SAP BTP ABAP environment

entry.title: How to hide a column in ALV report and display it in exported file using factory method.
entry.content:
How to hide a column in ALV report and display it in exported file using factory method.

I tried to use SET_VISIBLE and SET_TECHNICAL on the column but they are not working.

It is hiding the field in ALV display but also giving blank column in downloaded file.

        MOVE lo_columns->get_column( c_pick_status ) TO lo_column.
        lo_column->set_long_text( text-020 ).
        lo_column-set_visible( abap_false ) or  lo_column-set_technical( abap_true ) ---> not working as expected.

entry.title: SUBMIT program USING SELECTION-SET goes to GUI SCREEN instead of providing a list.
entry.content:
SUBMIT riaufk20
      USING SELECTION-SET p_varnam
      EXPORTING LIST TO MEMORY AND RETURN.

    TRY.
        cl_salv_bs_runtime_info=>get_data_ref(
          IMPORTING
            r_data = DATA(lo_data)
        ).
        IF lo_data IS NOT BOUND.
          MESSAGE 'No data was captured from the ALV runtime.' TYPE 'E'.
          RETURN.
        ELSE.
          ASSIGN lo_data->* TO FIELD-SYMBOL(<lfs_datatab>).

I am using above code to call IW38 report, which gives a list of orders to be confirmed, user clicks the order from the list and goes to below screen to confirm the order



In case of multiple orders IW38 provides a list of orders and I can call the BAPI to confirm the orders inside a loop.
But in case of 1 record, the transaction IW38 itself goes to the above screen instead of providing a list.

But my code fails and opens a new window for the gui transaction, is there anyway I can get list of 1 record instead of above screen?

entry.title: Creating ServiceOrder via I_SERVICEORDERTP
entry.content:
Hi,

I am creating Serviceorders via I_SERVICEORDERTP.

Im using basically the example code thats given in the documentation.

DATA: lt_order_to_create            TYPE TABLE FOR CREATE i_serviceordertp,
          lt_item_to_create_cba         TYPE TABLE FOR CREATE i_serviceordertp\_serviceorderitemtp,
          ls_item_to_create_cba         LIKE LINE OF lt_item_to_create_cba,
          lt_item_target                LIKE ls_item_to_create_cba-%target,
          lt_refobj_to_create_cba       TYPE TABLE FOR CREATE i_serviceordertp\_srvcordreferenceobjecttp,
          ls_refobj_to_create_cba       LIKE LINE OF lt_refobj_to_create_cba,
          lt_refobj_target              LIKE ls_refobj_to_create_cba-%target,
          lt_priceelement_to_create_cba TYPE TABLE FOR CREATE i_serviceordertp\_srvcordpriceelementtp,
          ls_priceelement_to_create_cba LIKE LINE OF lt_priceelement_to_create_cba,
          lt_priceelement_target        LIKE ls_priceelement_to_create_cba-%target,
          lt_item_refobj_cba            TYPE TABLE FOR CREATE i_serviceorderitemtp\_srvcorditemreferenceobjecttp,
          ls_item_refobj_cba            LIKE LINE OF lt_item_refobj_cba,
          lt_item_refobj_target         LIKE ls_item_refobj_cba-%target,
          lt_priceitem_cba              TYPE TABLE FOR CREATE i_serviceorderitemtp\_srvcorditempriceelementtp,
          ls_priceitem_cba              LIKE LINE OF lt_priceitem_cba,
          lt_priceitem_cba_target       LIKE ls_priceitem_cba-%target.

    INSERT VALUE #( %cid = 'CID_HDR'
                    serviceordertype     = 'SRVO'
                    serviceorderdescription = 'Service Order using EML'
                    language                = 'E'
                    soldtoparty             = '17100001'
                    salesorganization       = '1010'
                    division                = '00'
                    distributionchannel     = '10'
                    %control = VALUE #( serviceordertype        = cl_abap_behv=>flag_changed
                                        serviceorderdescription = cl_abap_behv=>flag_changed
                                        language                = cl_abap_behv=>flag_changed
                                        soldtoparty             = cl_abap_behv=>flag_changed
                                        salesorganization       = cl_abap_behv=>flag_changed
                                        division                = cl_abap_behv=>flag_changed
                                        distributionchannel     = cl_abap_behv=>flag_changed )
                  ) INTO TABLE lt_order_to_create.

    INSERT VALUE #( %cid = 'CID_ITEM'
                    product  = 'SRV_01'
                    quantity = '1'
                  ) INTO TABLE lt_item_target.

    IF lt_item_target IS NOT INITIAL.
      INSERT  VALUE #( %cid_ref = 'CID_HDR'
                       %target  = lt_item_target
                     ) INTO TABLE lt_item_to_create_cba.
    ENDIF.

    INSERT VALUE #( %cid  = 'CID_HDR_REFOBJ'
                    servicereferenceequipment = '000000000010000009' ) INTO TABLE lt_refobj_target.


    IF lt_refobj_target IS NOT INITIAL.
      INSERT  VALUE #( %cid_ref = 'CID_HDR'
                       %target  = lt_refobj_target
                      ) INTO TABLE lt_refobj_to_create_cba.
    ENDIF.

    INSERT VALUE #( %cid  = 'CID_HDR_PRICEELE'
                    conditiontype = 'DRV1'
                    conditionratevalue = '45'
                    conditioncurrency = 'EUR' ) INTO TABLE lt_priceelement_target.

    IF lt_priceelement_target IS NOT INITIAL.
      INSERT  VALUE #( %cid_ref = 'CID_HDR'
                       %target  = lt_priceelement_target
                     ) INTO TABLE lt_priceelement_to_create_cba.
    ENDIF.

    INSERT VALUE #( %cid  = 'CID_ITEM_REFOBJ'
                    servicereferenceequipment = '000000000010000009' ) INTO TABLE lt_item_refobj_target.

    IF lt_item_refobj_target IS NOT INITIAL.
      INSERT VALUE #( %cid_ref = 'CID_ITEM'
                      %target  = lt_item_refobj_target ) INTO TABLE lt_item_refobj_cba.
    ENDIF.

    INSERT VALUE #( %cid  = 'CID_ITEM_PRICEELE'
                    conditiontype = 'DRV1'
                    conditionratevalue = '45'
                    conditioncurrency = 'EUR' ) INTO TABLE lt_priceitem_cba_target.

    IF lt_priceitem_cba_target IS NOT INITIAL.
      INSERT VALUE #( %cid_ref = 'CID_ITEM'
                      %target  = lt_priceitem_cba_target ) INTO TABLE lt_priceitem_cba.
    ENDIF.

    MODIFY ENTITIES OF i_serviceordertp
     ENTITY serviceorder
       CREATE FROM lt_order_to_create
       CREATE BY \_serviceorderitemtp FROM lt_item_to_create_cba
       CREATE BY \_srvcordreferenceobjecttp FROM lt_refobj_to_create_cba
       CREATE BY \_srvcordpriceelementtp FROM lt_priceelement_to_create_cba
     ENTITY serviceorderitem
       CREATE BY \_srvcorditemreferenceobjecttp FROM lt_item_refobj_cba
       CREATE BY \_srvcorditempriceelementtp   FROM lt_priceitem_cba
         MAPPED DATA(mapped_modify)
         FAILED DATA(failed_modify)
         REPORTED DATA(reported_modify).

    COMMIT ENTITIES
      RESPONSE OF i_serviceordertp
      FAILED DATA(failed_commit)
      REPORTED DATA(reported_commit).

 

The Serviceorders are created with an error. The "EnterpriseServiceOrg" field is not set. The EnterpriseServiceOrg field is missing in the corresponging table ( lt_order_to_create ). 

My Question:

Is there a way to set the EnterpriseServiceOrg field?

Thanks

I have implemented the code in MV45AFZZ. However, upon saving, it does not take effect.

Tried to create watchpoint and the its values gets overwritten deep in standard objects. Any tips to address this?

entry.title: VA01 Line Item Numbering Increment Logic
entry.content:
Is it possible to implement a custom logic for the increment of numbering of line items in VA01/VA02? Tried to create a logic in MV45AFZZ but it doesnt seems to take effect or get triggered in the debugger.

here's what im trying to achieve:

Grandparent line item: 10000

Parent line item: 10800

Child line item: 10801

Grandchile line item: 10802

entry.title: cl_md_bp_maintain=>maintain - Create only contact person
entry.content:
Greetings experts,

I am currently creating Business Partner (Contact Person) with the  cl_md_bp_maintain=>maintain method.

I have checked the table containing the roles, only the role BUP001 (Contact Person) is in it. 
But when creating the business partner the 0000000 Role (Base BP) is always created additionally.
How can i avoid the addition of the 0000000 Role while still using the maintain method?
So that only the Contact Person with BUP001 is created.
I know that it is possible to only create a Contact Person (BP) using the transaction code BUA1.

entry.title: Custom fields added to extended SEGW OData entity not available in metadata
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

In Fiori App ID: F0843 (Post Goods Receipt for Purchasing Document), we are trying to add some custom fields in entity GR4PO_DL_Item of OData service MMIM_GR4PO_DL_SRV by redefinition and importing properties that are already available as an .include in the line item type MMIM_GR4PO_DL_ITEM.

After this we redefined "Define" method of MPC_EXT class with code:

  METHOD define.

  super->define( ).

  DATA(lo_entity_type) = model->get_entity_type( iv_entity_name = 'GR4PO_DL_Item' ).

  " Expand the specific include structure to expose its fields
  lo_entity_type->add_auto_expand_include(
    EXPORTING
      iv_include_name     = 'MMIM_GR4PO_DL_ITEM'
      iv_bind_conversions = abap_true
  ).
ENDMETHOD.

We followed the same approach as shown in this learning journey:

https://learning.sap.com/courses/building-odata-services-with-sap-gateway/redefining-an-sap-gateway-service

We already generated the Runtime objects and there seems to be no error as metadata loading properly. However, in the metadata the custom fields are not available and we are not sure what could be missing. The metadata does show the all the inlcudes but does not show the fields added to include, even though they are available in extended entity type.

Did someone face similar situation and can help in finding the solution?

entry.title: JSON Payload Download Implementation in RAP Application
entry.content:
Hello Expert,

I am currently working on a custom RAP (RESTful ABAP Programming Model) Application in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud. In this application, we use an API to send data to an external portal.

Now there is a new requirement when the user clicks a button, the JSON payload that is used in the ABAP program for sending data via the API should be downloaded in JSON format.

For this purpose, I have already created a custom action in the Behavior Definition, and the button is visible in the Application. My question is how to implement the download functionality so that the same JSON payload used for the API call can be downloaded by the user in JSON format and Also, please explain how to implement the JSON download functionality in the RAP application with step by step guidance.

Thank you,

entry.title: Inter-company billing transfer IDOC issue(about enhance)
entry.content:
Hi All,

When we initiate an inter-company billing, the corresponding IDOC is automatically forwarded.

Now we need to set up accounting on IDOC.

The line that originally had EWLNR='*' set in OBCB, the account assignment is 51110090.

Now, a new line EWLNR='99890007' has been added, with the account assignment 70100001.

However, because one subject represents costs and the other revenue, the screen configurations are different.

This causes the following error in IDOC. Because our system's revenue category does not have a quantity field.

Is there an enhancement that allows removing the quantity on the IDOC before the throw?

Are there any other suggested approaches?

 

If anything above is unclear, please feel free to ask further questions. 

Thanks All !
